div.p: This value set expansion contains 3 concepts.

td.a: First mumps dose from the primary series was administered-125

tr.td: First mumps dose from the primary series was administered

div.p: Count of vaccines administered (where "Vaccine type" = "Mumps-containing vaccines" and "Type of dose" = "Primary series") = 1

td.a: Second mumps dose from the primary series was administered. The primary series has been completed-103

tr.td: Second mumps dose from the primary series was administered. The primary series has been completed

div.p: "Completed the primary vaccination series" = TRUE (where "Vaccine type" = "Mumps-containing vaccines")"

description.value: ValueSet IMMZD18SMumps for IMMZ.D18.S.Mumps schedule. Business rule: Determine if the client is due for a mumps vaccination according to the national immunization schedule Trigger: IMMZ.D2 Determine required vaccination(s) if any Table: 2-dose schedule

code.value: First mumps dose from the primary series was administered-125

display.value: First mumps dose from the primary series was administered

code.value: Second mumps dose from the primary series was administered. The primary series has been completed-103

display.value: Second mumps dose from the primary series was administered. The primary series has been completed
